= AnnotationProperty: '$this.label$' =
 
<pre>
The identifier '$this.label$' represents a predicate that can be used to associate annotate an object with a literal value.</pre>

== General Information ==

* '''Full name''': ''$this$''
* '''Associated aggregator''': ''$this.aggregator$''
* '''Description''': ''$this.comment$''
